body:
https://gist.github.com/konard/b07822e67eaf74ab38b59de95ff7626a

We need to find out the root cause and fix it.

Also looks like we need to add simplest possible eslint configuration, to make sure it will not be possible to reference not defined variables in the code files.

And make sure all code files related to hive.mjs and solve.mjs covered with eslint checks.
title: Solve command not working
